product.title: Mayo with Avocado Oil
product.body_html: May-o all your condiment dreams come true. The mayo that started it all, made with avocado oil and organic eggs for a taste that’s uncompromisingly delicious!
product.tags: banned-au, byo-meal-prep, cage-free-eggs, certified-gluten-free, certified-keto, certified-non-gmo, certified-paleo, Keto, kosher, oil-and-vin, PKMAYO1, soy-canola-free, sugar-free-asterix, Whole30, whole30-approved

I hate mayo, but love this

I hate mayo. HATE. It was not until this brand that I actually started liking it. It's not made with nasty junk. I use it sparingly, and mostly for my air fried steak bites! My family also loves this mayo (even the old school folks who are used to that whip stuff).

Clean ingredients I feel good about eating!
